tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Inspirational (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
stu_tags: HILARIOUS  GROUP PROJECTS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: I LOVED her! She was so helpful and made the class very fun! I would recommend to anyone who needs to take Public Speaking. She is so funny and is always there to help. Always has the class laughing and makes public speaking less intimidating and fun. Take her class, you wont regret it! Definitely will miss her class!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Inspirational (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: I took public speaking my first semester with Mrs. Townsend and had an amazing time in the class. Going in I was definitely nervous to talk in front of a class but she made the class very enjoyable and made public speaking seem not so scary. I have nothing bad to say about her she is an amazing person and professor!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Inspirational (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: She doesn\'t give homework because she says preparing for speeches it\'s stressful enough. No quizzes either. There\'s a rhetorical criticism paper you have to write, and there are 4 speeches for the whole semester. Not bad compared to other teachers. I would definitely take her again and I HATE public speaking.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Inspirational (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: Professor Townsend was by far my favorite teacher so far. She has a lot of energy and loves what she teaches. She will motivate you to do your best and as long as you prepare for class you will do well. She loves helping students with their speeches so don\'t be afraid to ask her. Just make sure to let her know if you\'re going to miss a class.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Inspirational (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: i have never given a public speech prior to this class, and i would not recommend it to anyone. i did not learn anything!! townsend is very unwilling to help but luckily my older cousin helped me edit everything. the syllabus and rubrics are not consistent with her expectations or grading. if you\'re a self-starter like me, you\'ll still struggle.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Inspirational (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: would advise against this prof. i\'m sure i would have a chip on my shoulder if i had a phd and the best job i could get is at a podunk town\'s community college. her ego explains it all! don\'t do it, for your own sake!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Inspirational (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: She is a Great teacher and understanding, just make sure to tell her ahead of time if you are going to miss class. She will work with you if you go to her office and discuss any problems you have. Great personality and funny at times.

Gives good feedback (4)  Inspirational (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: Prof Townsend was not very friendly. I had a very unfortunate death in the family, and she wouldn\'t excuse me from her class to attend the funeral. Obviously I went to the funeral but I had to take a hit and receive a zero on one speech (only have three all semester). I would not recommend her as a professor to anyone.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Inspirational (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: She is a nice person but her reaching in general is not strong, she is more into the public transit meetings than she is her students, and her grading is not consistent with what the syllabus says. As well as when i email she insults me. and still does not answer my initial email.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Inspirational (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: She was a good teacher, clarity, helpfulness and nice. However, I did not learn much on public speaking this class was merely used to push her grant, pushing her career rather then pushing th student to actuely learn public speaking. I wish I switched out rather than stay and she should have told us that we will never use the book, waste of my $$

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Inspirational (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: Used the class as a tool for her research grant. Whole class is based on having to do volunteer work and riding public transit, all class work based upon this. Supposed to be a public speaking class, ended up being a speaking about public transportation class. Professor herself seems very nice however, funny too.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Inspirational (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: Well what can I say? Rebecca is really one of a kind,has great dynamic,is passionate about what she teaches. The environment in Proffesor Townsend\'s classroom is definately different than the traditional class. It is relaxing, funny, but work gets done all at the same time. very understanding and always willing to help during and outside class!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Inspirational (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: She is probs my fave teacher this semester. She is EXTREMELY helpful and she is always there. She is a funny teacher who has both a playful side but also a get to work side. Overall she is great, she is vry interested in her course and she works with the student to get A work. A caring awesome teacher who doesnt assign test instead speech\'s

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Inspirational (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: This professor is wonderful, she truly cares about her subject, and about seeing her students succeed!She is more than happy to meet outside of class, emails back fairly quickly, and hands back papers fairly quickly. I would most definitely recommend her Interperson Communication class.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Inspirational (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: Very good professor. Was not too excited for taking public speaking, but it has been my favorite class in college so far. Very unique professor, makes one feel comfortable with speaking in front of others, class was very enjoyable. I wish we did a little more speaking though, only did four speeches total. I would definetly recommend class/professor
